Question: This person stated, "Yeah, I've gotten myself into situations where I would not walk away and I've pushed the envelope.
Hints: Due to this, this person set records in player salary by signing annual contracts worth in excess of US $30 million per season.
This person listed his Highland Park mansion for sale in 2012.
This person executed a series of plays, considered to be one of the greatest clutch performances in NBA Finals history.
